sentences.en: Contraception birth control by prevention of conception or impregnation.
sentences.cn: 避孕:人类生理学术语,指有意防止怀孕的措施.

sentences.en: Contraception Birth control by prevention of conception or impregnation.
sentences.cn: 人类生理学术语,指有意防止怀孕的措施.

sentences.en: Contraception is still a controversial issue in this part of the world.
sentences.cn: 在该地区节育仍是个有争议的问题.

sentences.en: His report suggests that older women might consider other forms of contraception.
sentences.cn: 他的报告建议年龄较大的妇女要考虑用其他种类的避孕法.

sentences.en: Hormonal Contraception and False - Positive Cervical Cytology: Is There an Association?
sentences.cn: 激素避孕与宫颈细胞学检查假阳性: 两者之间存在关联 吗 ?

sentences.en: In poor regions rate of contraception should be raised.
sentences.cn: 要提高贫困地区的节育率.

sentences.en: Intrauterine devices ( IUDs ) are safe and effective forms of long - term reversible contraception.
sentences.cn: 宫内节育器 ( IUDs ) 是安全有效且可逆的 长期 避孕方法.

sentences.en: Many forms of oral contraception use a synthetic progesterone.
sentences.cn: 许多口服避孕法即使用合成的孕酮.

sentences.en: Nursing baby is no substitute for contraception.
sentences.cn: 哺乳不是避孕的替代措施.

sentences.en: Ovulation calendar helps you to use the natural contraception method.
sentences.cn: 它可帮助你记录并避免怀孕,甚至可以为你的孩子指明性别.

sentences.en: She is known to have liberal views on divorce and contraception.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，她在离婚与避孕方面思想很开明。

sentences.en: Sterilization: Any surgical procedure intended to end fertility permanently ( see contraception ) .
sentences.cn: 绝育: 任何用来永久结束 生育力 的外科方法.

sentences.en: The law allows doctors to prescribe contraception to the under 16s.
sentences.cn: 法律允许医生给16岁以下未成年人开避孕药。

sentences.en: The pill is a popular method of contraception.
sentences.cn: 服用避孕药是一种常用的避孕方法。

sentences.en: What, there's a double standard in terms of parents providing contraception to their kids?
sentences.cn: 怎么, 难道父母为孩子提供避孕措施还有双重标准 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 避孕用具；[药] 避孕剂

trans.tran_en: the practice of preventing a woman from becoming  pregnant  when she has sex, or the methods for doing this
